content: I'm closing the tree for the next 2-3 hours to make the move to the new metadata collection. This can take anything between half an hour to ???. Let's hope it goes well :)

Everything worked out! The new website style is up. Two python scripts got deleted #RIIReverything :crab: :tada:

Thanks for all the work put into this @xFrednet.

Take a look at the new website: https://rust-lang.github.io/rust-clippy/master/index.html

Beta will get the new website tomorrow, the stable documentation in 6 weeks.

(Tree is open again btw)

Oh and @T-clippy when you review PRs, that add new lints, make sure that the lint declaration now uses the heading style for the doc:

### What it does

Argh, I had a brain fart. In order to get the metadata collector move into beta I would have need to do the move 2 weeks ago. Now I have to manually patch the deployments of beta and stable for 2 release cycles... :rolling_eyes:
